verses.text:
The dove of peace, of peace, of peace,
Hath come to earth her flight;
O within their heart the dove will light,
For Jesus came to bring us light, from sin's great darkness into light,
O love!

chorus.text:
It is the achoor Love's sweet song,
Of peace, of truth that we so long to;
The dove of peace sings in my soul,
'The Saviour's Blood doth make me whole.'
